title: [FEATURE] [WASM] Expose canvasSize in SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor
body:

analogous to https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/1831 & https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/1832 it may is useful o expose the canvasSize Property, too. As suggested here: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/discussions/1888

comments.body: More than just the canvas size, anyone who wants to do non-trivial JS interop (in addition to merely drawing) with this `<canvas>` element needs the htmlCanvas `ElementReference` exposed.
